RelatedSentence: The State of Alaska should consider buying out BP 's interest in Prudhoe Bay and the Trans - Alaska Pipeline System , in view of BP 's sale of its smaller holdings on the North Slope to Hilcorp , which signaled BP 's desire to scale back in Alaska .
